message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I propose an initial price of $12000. This is a special offer considering its high worth to you and our confidence in its ability to meet your needs.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I'm interested, $12000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying right now. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. In light of this, I am willing to consider your offer. My counteroffer is $11000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the value we place on it.
